hints.content:
Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-:
$2$ | $3$ | $\blueD8$ | $0$

The $\blueD8$ in $2{,}3\blueD80$ is in  the $\blueD{\text{tens}}$ place.

Now, let's divide $2{,}3\blueD80\div10$. 


Dividing by $10$ moves every digit one place to the right.

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-:
|$\rightarrow\fbox2$ | $\fbox3$ |$\blueD{\fbox8}$ | $\fbox0$ 

$2{,}3\blueD80\div 10=23\blueD8$

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-:
$$ | $$ | $2$ | $3$ | $\blueD8$

The $\blueD8$ moves to the $\blueD{\text{ones}}$ place.

question.content:

$2{,}380\div10$
